name: Export LinkedIn Lead Gen Forms submission counts to Google Sheets
description:
This template periodically counts new LinkedIn Lead Gen Forms during a specified period in the past and the exports the count to a Google Sheets spreadsheet.

The current configuration is looking for new leads generated "yesterday". 

The template uses [this sample](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ctzgMOxAW7FNA1zCuIdi78IyFLJRzP1xYzXvJjCso_4/edit?usp=sharing) Google Sheets spreadsheet as the destination for the lead counts.

The template is scheduled to run daily at 8 am  - you can change this after finishing the template setup.
